name: Gun-Fight
description:
Control Guide: Out-Law & Sheriff.

Out-Law: W-Up, D-Forward, A-Back & F-Shooting.

Shooting Guide For Out-Law:

Q-Upper-Right For Shooting & E-Lower-Right For Soothing.

Sheriff: Up-Arrow For Up, Down-Arrow For Down, Left-Arrow For Forward, Right-Arrow For Back. Even The Keypad's Too Such As (8, 4, 6 & 2). Oh And '/" For Soothing.

Shooting Guide For Sheriff:

7 For Shooting Upper & 9 For Down. Only On The Keypad.

Gamepad Controller Guide: Be Careful To Insert The Controller To Your PC.

Restart Guide: H Button Is For Restart.

Funny Ending; Once The Countdown Reach Is Zero It Will Say "Insert A Coin". It's Only For Fun. 

Enjoy The Game.
